subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shawn Marion scored a season-high 27 points, blocked 6 shots and made 5 of Phoenix’s 20 3-pointers to lead the Suns to a 137-115 victory over the visiting Denver Nuggets.
snippet: Shawn Marion scored a season-high 27 points, blocked 6 shots and made 5 of Phoenix’s 20 3-pointers to lead the Suns to a 137-115 victory over the visiting Denver Nuggets.
